Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI provided quick and easy help on tutorial questions whereas teachers you have to find the time to go to consults and get there in person

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I feel I could ask any question of AI and not feel dumb whereas if you ask a teacher a 'dumb' question you may feel you should already know it

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: You can easily get AI to dumb it down further
